content: this cheerful crochet tote is made of 2 granny square motifs for a perfect 12 square bag featuring super bulky bernat blanket squares are joined together and finished off with a shoulder strap practice crocheting in the round double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet around back post chain single_crochet and slip_stitch join techniques any color combination will create a similar look for this versatile pattern bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a pink dust 10956 1 ball or 110 yds/100 m contrast b sunsoaked 10918 1 ball or 150 yds/137 m measurement approx 12 30 5 cm square excluding handle
